nfst/simple_test.c

19 /* $Id$ */
20 
21 #include <stdio.h>
22 #include <math.h>
23 #include <string.h>
24 #include <stdlib.h>
25 
26 #define NFFT_PRECISION_DOUBLE
27 
28 #include "nfft3mp.h"
29 
30 static void simple_test_nfst_1d(void)
31 {
32  NFST(plan) p;
33 
34  const char *error_str;
35 
36  int N = 14;
37  int M = 19;
38 
40  NFST(init_1d)(&p,N,M);
41 
43  NFFT(vrand_real)(p.x, p.M_total, NFFT_K(0.0), NFFT_K(0.5));
44 
46  if( p.flags & PRE_ONE_PSI)
47  NFST(precompute_one_psi)(&p);
48 
50  NFFT(vrand_real)(p.f_hat, p.N_total, NFFT_K(0.0), NFFT_K(1.0));
51  NFFT(vpr_double)(p.f_hat,p.N_total,"given Fourier coefficients, vector f_hat");
52 
54  error_str = NFST(check)(&p);
55  if (error_str != 0)
56  {
57  printf("Error in nfst module: %s\n", error_str);
58  return;
59  }
60 
62  NFST(trafo_direct)(&p);
63  NFFT(vpr_double)(p.f,p.M_total,"ndst, vector f");
64 
66  NFST(trafo)(&p);
67  NFFT(vpr_double)(p.f,p.M_total,"nfst, vector f");
68 
70  NFST(adjoint_direct)(&p);
71  NFFT(vpr_double)(p.f_hat,p.N_total,"adjoint ndst, vector f_hat");
72 
74  NFST(adjoint)(&p);
75  NFFT(vpr_double)(p.f_hat,p.N_total,"adjoint nfst, vector f_hat");
76 
78  NFST(finalize)(&p);
79 }
80 
81 int main(void)
82 {
83  printf("Computing one dimensional ndct, nfct, adjoint ndct, and adjoint nfct...\n\n");
84  simple_test_nfst_1d();
85  printf("\n\n");
86 
87  return EXIT_SUCCESS;
88 }
Generated on Tue Jun 2 2015 16:39:36 for NFFT by   1.8.5
